name: decoct
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to boil something in order to obtain its flavour: Grenadine syrup is traditionally decocted from pomegranates. The root should not be decocted or the essential oil will evaporate. Related word
decoction
More examplesFewer examplesThis tea is the most popular decocted beverage in Japan.You can decoct a tea out of dried herbs and spices.This medicine is stronger because it has been decocted longer.The herbs were decocted in water and administered to the patient in two doses.When you are decocting, start with strong heat and then reduce to a simmer.
